title: BRIEF: Brady Short leads MSCS points standings
content:
Brady Short leads MSCS standings 

Brady Short continues leading the MSCS points standings entering Saturday's fourth annual Class Track Fall Roundup at Tri-State Speedway. With two MSCS races left, Short has a 68-point lead over second-place Carson Short. The final MSCS race is the Harvest Cup on Oct. 10, also at Tri-State Speedway.
